评论详情: Needed a few more sweaters to wear to work.  This is great quality and thickness.  Not too think but not very thin either.  The bottom portion of the sleeves were a tad tight but I can live with that.  I also purchased the black and white striped.  They seem to be of good quality so far.
This sweater fit perfectly. I am 5’4” 140lbs and ordered a small. I get so many compliments on this sweater. Definitely recommend.

This blue color is absolutely beautiful and the sweater is by far one of my favorites so much so that everytime I wear it I catch myself back on Amazon to order another color. The fit, the warmth, the length, the material…everything about this is a 10/10 highly recommended!!!
Very comfortable sweater. Its thick, but not itchy. Goes great with a pair of leggings and sneakers

I got this sweater a while back and I've had it for about 5 months. I absolutely love it and wear it all the time. It's comfortable and the material is soft, not scratchy at all. It has a great stretch to it and thick enough to keep you warm. The material is great quality and even after numerous washes I've had no issues with it.  The color is a semi bright white and it really is such a versatile piece. I highly recommend this sweater, It will be a staple in your closet.
I love the colors and it is soft and warm.
Great wife likes it.
Very nice. Good quality sweater
Thick material, good color but a little boxy on me. Fit is alright, was hoping for a bit longer of a sweater.
Really really wide

评论概述: Distorted color in front of sweater

I am 5’11” and the sleeves were plenty long. I love the fit and could wear with jeans or leggings. It’s very soft and medium thickness. I love it and will be ordering in another color.
Love the color! Super comfortable and cozy! Perfect fall sweater!
Bought 2 of these because they looked so cute, but the fit is super boxy and not flattering, so returning both. Doesn’t look like the pics at all.

I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the vibrant colors of this sweater, it looks exactly like the picture.  I am 5'8' 155lbs and I bought a large and I feel like it runs true to size.  It is a bit stiff and it looks better with front tucked into jeans.  I received many compliments on it and how pretty everyone thought it was when I wore it over the Holiday.  I many even buy another one.  I feel it was a good buy, the quality is very  nice also.

评论概述: Love the color shape and quality material
评论详情: Good price and material but came very wrinkled . Washed, tumbled and hung and still see ingrained wrinkles .

It’s light weight yet keeps you warm ,  the fit was exactly as expected ( not to loose or too tight ) , great quality and an amazing deal for the price  The color was exactly as described. Will be ordering this in some of the other colors.

This is hands down my absolute favorite top right now. Love the ribbed detail. Absolutely, love the three tone color of the sweater. Material is soft. Fit is true to size. Disclaimer: i have not dried this top in the dryer, i've only hung it to dry for fear of losing length. Fyi  This top is so amazingly comfortable and cute that i've ordered two more.  Did originally get it on sale, and right now, there is a 15% off coupon available.

评论概述: Ran really big, not figure flattering
评论详情: I ordered a Large and an XL because I wasn't sure which would fit me.  Both ran really huge, and they sent me the wrong shirt in one of the sizes.  It's not form fitting at all and the neck is super high.  I'm 5'8" and weigh 160, my measurements are 44 bust, 34 waist, 44 hips.  Normally I like this brand but this shirt wasn't for me.
Love this sweater!! Big too bulky, and not too thin! The weight is perfect. Super soft and made very well. The price is also a good point to mention. I would buy this again.

评论概述: Perfect long sleeve for style and warmth
评论详情: I love the color and quality of this long sleeve. Super soft and love the ribbed detailing. Lots of colors to choose from. Definitely a must add to your fall and winter wardrobe!

Super cute casual long sleeve fall top! I paired it with a pair of cowgirl boots and a brown baseball cap for a fun fall evening. The shirt is made of a nice heavy material and is not see through. The area near the wrist is a bit different but very easy to get used to and didn't keep me from wearing the shirt. It could easily be dressed up as well. It does not cling to the body.
Very nice fabric. So soft. Didn't lose it's shape when washed.
Shrunk and faded on first wash.

This sweater looked awesome. I love the colors and the material feels soft and comfortable. What makes this a weird fit is the sleeves. I don't have large arms but the sleeves are tight. I believe I ordered a large when maybe I should have ordered the Xlarge. After I washed it the sleeves were even tighter. I would say maybe order a size up if you don't like tight sleeves.

I love this sweater. The material is so soft and comfortable with a slight stretch to it. Would be perfect with leggings or jeans. The color block style looks great.  One of my favorite purchases this fall.
Not soft and too tigjt
It was larger than I expected. Just wasn’t me. But for other people it is probably a good fit if you want it as a larger fit.

评论概述: More like a shirt vs sweater
评论详情: Love the ribbed detail. Purchased a small. I had to return because I have too many clothes. Color is a lovely green.

I'm 5'1" and 130 lbs, I typically wear a small, and this sweater fits perfectly. The ribbed knit adds a nice texture, and the side slits give it a trendy touch while ensuring it’s comfortable and easy to move in.  The crew neck is classic and versatile, making it easy to pair with jeans or skirts. I appreciate the quality of the material; it feels soft against the skin and keeps me warm without being too heavy. The color options are also great, allowing for easy mixing and matching with my fall wardrobe.  Overall, I highly recommend this sweater for anyone looking for a stylish and cozy addition to their closet. It’s definitely become a staple for me this season!
Comfortable. The long straight portion near the wrists feel odd, but  I got used to it.

This sweater is amazing! I'm 5'10/190lbs/size 14 bottoms. This top is roomy and long enough. Could be dress up or down depending on the occasion. Can leave the sleeve long or roll easily for a 3/4 look. Will buy more colors in the one!
Great feeling material. Washes well. Hang to dry. No wrinkle. Great buy
It fits perfect, not too tight and I really like the color
Colors are perfect for fall!  I plan to wear it a lot!  Very soft and comfy.
Great shirt! Stretchy material, soft and comfortable.
Looove this sweater. The quality is so great & the texture makes it feel like something high end. Bought it in 2 colors.

This long sleeved sweater has a nice texture to the material. The sweater is well made and fits well. The neck line isn’t as scooped as I had hoped, based on the picture, but the color is true. It’ll work well in cooler weather and is pretty comfortable.

评论概述: Love the sweater except for this one thread
评论详情: This sweater is super comfortable! The only reason it didn’t get 5 stars is because of the weird thread pull in the middle of the stomach area. Super noticeable. Unfortunately I can’t replace it because it’s out of the 30 day window.  My suggestion: buy this sweater but check it for thread pulls!!!
Great top for fall.  Description calls it a sweater.  I would classify it as a top.  It is a knit top.
This sweater is a very soft and comfortable with a little stretch. I recommend sizing up for a good fit.
Just like the pictures. Perfect fit. Great quality. Soft material.
Cute sweater, but stretchy and tight through waist.
Very comfy, true to size, only reason it's 4 and not 5 are the sleeves are way too long
fits great, good color, very nice sweater, weight is good , not to heavy.
This sweater is exactly as pictured. It’s great quality and so comfortable. For is relaxed and goes perfectly dressed up or casual.
So cute and comfortable. Not clingy
Good quality, flattering and comfortable fit. Buy the shirt!!
This sweater is even nicer than the photo shows. The fabric is a very nice quality - soft yet sturdy.  Fit is also true to size. I’ll be ordering another colour.
I am 5.6 170 lbs ordered xl. Sweater is nice weight , no cling & we'll fitting. Love the sweater dressed up or with jeans. Satisfied with purchase.
This shirt is nice and will help you go from the ninety degree weather to the seventy degree weather
Just buy it! The color and size is true to site. It is so soft too! Beautiful fall colors.
It fits perfectly and the fabric is soft.
Fits TTS. Color is a orangy-beige. Warmer in tone than I like, but it fits so well I am going to try it this fall with jeans!

评论概述: Can’t wait till winter to wear!
评论详情: Love that the sleeves taper at the wrists. Such soft material. Beautiful color. High quality material.
I like the color and the way it fit. It is just the right weight and softness.

评论概述: True to Size | Loose Fit | Great Color
评论详情: This fit great! The color was spot ok, and it is a loose fit. They could be a bit softer for my tasts, and it is decently thin - perfect for layering or wearing with a jacket! I would say moderately warm too (going back to the layering game!)
Really love the fabric. Not too heavy, not too light. Very soft and comfy. I like the color combination I selected as well.
The color was so Fall and it is so soft and comfortable.  It fits as expected and looks great on.
The color is just as pretty as the picture.  Also, note that sleeves have a feature that allows you to fold it up which is really nice for anyone with short arms like me!

评论概述: A bit structured for my taste
评论详情: I wish this was a bit more slouchy. It feels very structured. I imagine I will probably mostly use it to WFH. Maybe it will soften up a bit after a wash/dry.
Great quality!  Not too thick, not too thin. Doesn’t apprear to be material that will snag easily. Love the colors too!
I can't really explain the material - but it is very nice & soft. Interested to see how it goes after a washing.

I ordered two of these sweaters and absolutely love them. Will be wearing them as soon as the weather cools down. I would recommend them to everyone. Will probably wear mine mostly with jeans but they would look wonderful with nice pants for work or worship. I ordered a extra large and it fits great which is my normal size.

评论概述: Love the crisp white of this sweater! So comfy and stretchy!
评论详情: Preparing for my fall wardrobe re-do, I'm so glad I added this as a nice staple top! It can be dressed up or down. It's perfect quality, the rubbing is nice, it's not lined but it's definitely high quality material to keep you warm and take the chill off. The stretch is nice as well. Super pleased with this top.

评论概述: Dress it up or down. Very nice knit.
评论详情: Wasn’t sure what to expect from this sweater, but my expectations were exceeded. The fit is comfortable without looking baggy or sloppy. The knit is clean and uniform and can be worn with a lot of things. The sleeves are extra long so you can push them up or fold the long cuffs. The sides are split a few inches at the hem to give you extra movement and comfort. I expect to wear this often when cooler weather hits.
This sweater is incredibly flattering and true to size. I wish I could get it in every color!!

The Zeagoo sweater is very soft. The sleeves are unusual ("a little weird" per my niece) but I actually like that - it adds interest. The sweater is very comfortable. I like the length of the sweater (I don't wear cropped tops) and it fits me well. Love the colors.
This sweater fits oversized. I love the sleeves and the textured stripe detail. This is soft but not too soft and think this will become a staple for fall and winter.

This is a cute shirt, it's nice and loose and has a good material & cut. The sleeves are a bit long, so, at least for me, folding them will be perfect. The material is lightweight yet substantial for fall and winter.

I really like the fabric of this sweater...it is somewhat stretchy and so warm and comfy.  I have washed and dried it (in my dryer on "light") and it held up well, didn't shrink and came out of the dryer still a bit damp, but with no wrinkles.  It is true to size....fits me well, but loose....sleeves are long enough and the colors are pretty.  The 4-star review is because the fit is pretty loose and looks a straight and  boxy if you don't turn it under or tuck it in anywhere, but it is really comfortable.  For the $35 price tag, I feel it should have more shape.Side note: I have been a Vine member for almost a year and I give totally honest reviews. To earn 5 stars, the products I review have to be really well made, perform extremely well, and have a decent price point. I have no qualms coming back to revise my reviews if products fail to perform or turn out to be junk.

I ordered my normal top size (small), and am overall very pleased with this sweater.  There is some slight bunching of the fabric near my arm pit (hence 4 stars, not 5), but it is not enough for me to want to return.  I am considering ordering this in another color, and will try a medium.  I ordered the dark green, and the color is absolutely beautiful.  It looks more army green in the picture but in reality is a dark moss green.  It can be dressed up or down, and is a nice mid-weight. ribbed-knit sweater - perfect for our mild South Texas winters.  I am 5' 5", and the arm length was perfect and the waistband hits just a few inches below the waist band.
I’m a 10/12 and this is oversized on me. Substantial knit, just as shown on the model.

The ribbed material makes this shirt stand out… along with the fitted, elastic wrists.  The wrists are what caught my attention first and then the ribbed material.  Plus the color, I guess I could go on about the many things I like about this shirt.  The fit is loose and flattering and the material is soft and comfortable.  I did flip up the sleeves just a little bit to shorten them.  With this material you don’t have to worry about shrinkage.  I did think the price was a little high.  I really liked the color selections, I had a hard time picking the right one.  I already know this is going to be a favorite of mine to wear this winter.

This will be one of my go to tops for the winter.  It looks really good on and is comfortable and light.  It is also easy care.  I always hang all new clothes after washing them and this was almost wrinkle free so it probably will be after another was or two.  Very easy care.  I am a medium and it fits me very well.

This top runs a little large/has a looser fit. The bottom of the sleeves is weird because of how long the cuff lines are. I will try folding them in half as shown in one of the product pictures. I will also tuck it at least in the front, because it's not very flattering if left untucked.

评论概述: I like this sweater and it runs true to size for me!
评论详情: Nice sweater, love the color and texture of the fabric, not too heavy. I like the style and fit. Care is cool wash and no dryer - line dry. Nice for fall. For the price I wish it had more a durable fabric.

评论概述: One of my favorite women's manufacturers does it again!  Love this top!
评论详情: I have a number of tops made by Zeagoo and they consistently put out high-quality items. The fabric is quality, fit is good, workmanship is top notch, and affordable to boot!  This pullover sweater is very nice. The fabric is substantial and has a nice stretch to it. The color, Wine, is deep and rich. I got a large, which is roomy for me but I'd rather it be roomy than tight.  I may love this sweater enough to get another one in a different color!
Thick but lightweight, ribbed sweater material. It’s super cute and unique. Absolutely love it.

评论概述: Cute, Heavier than Expected but Very Nice
评论详情: This is a very nice sweater. It is cute. It is heavier than expected but it's still great. Comfortable. It would have fit better 1 to 2 sizes smaller.
Me encantó esta sudadera, es cómoda y la tela súper suave
